refnamediv.refpurpose: wget-like utility for download files over SMB

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: This tool is part of the samba 7 suite.
smbget is a simple utility with wget-like semantics, that can download files from SMB servers. You can specify the files you would like to download on the command-line.
The files should be in the smb-URL standard, e.g. use smb://host/share/file for the UNC path \\\\HOST\\SHARE\\file.

listitem.para: Set same permissions on local file as are set on remote file.
Write the file that is being downloaded to the specified file. Can not be used together with -R.
Write the file that is being downloaded to standard output.
Use specified rcfile. This will be loaded in the order it was specified - e.g. if you specify any options before this one, they might get overridden by the contents of the rcfile.
Number of bytes to download in a block. Defaults to 64000.

refsect1.title: SMB URLS
refsect1.para: SMB URL's should be specified in the following format:

para.programlisting: smb://name/ means, if name is a workgroup, all the servers in this workgroup, or if name is a server, all the shares on this server.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLES
refsect1.programlisting: # Recursively download 'src' directory smbget -R smb://rhonwyn/jelmer/src # Download FreeBSD ISO and enable resuming smbget -r smb://rhonwyn/isos/FreeBSD5.1.iso # Recursively download all ISOs smbget -Rr smb://rhonwyn/isos # Backup my data on rhonwyn smbget -Rr smb://rhonwyn/

refsect1.title: BUGS
refsect1.para: Permission denied is returned in some cases where the cause of the error is unknown (such as an illegally formatted smb:// url or trying to get a directory without -R turned on).

refsect1.title: VERSION
refsect1.para: This man page is correct for version 3 of the Samba suite.
